cleanSwipe.name: Clean Swipe
cleanSwipe.description: The easiest way to declutter your photo library. Swipe left to delete, swipe right to keep. It's that simple.

features.title: Features
features.swipeDesc: Simply swipe left to delete, swipe right to keep your photos
features.unlimitedDesc: Clean your entire photo library with PRO subscription
features.videoDesc: Clean up videos along with your photos
features.smartModeDesc: View and manage all your saved photos in one place

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.text: Clean Swipe accesses your photo library only to display photos for cleaning. We do not upload, store, or share your photos with any third parties. All photo processing happens locally on your device.

permissions.title: Device Permissions
permissions.text: We request access to your Photo Library to enable the swipe cleaning feature. This permission can be revoked at any time through your device settings.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.text: We may collect anonymous usage statistics to improve our app. This data does not include any personal information or photos.

purchases.title: In-App Purchases
purchases.text: Subscription purchases are processed securely through Apple's App Store. We do not store your payment information.

advertising.title: Advertising
advertising.text: Free users may see ads powered by Google AdMob. Ad personalization can be managed through your device settings.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.text: If you have any questions about our privacy practices, please contact us at:

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.text: By downloading and using Clean Swipe, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the app.

usage.title: 2. App Usage
usage.text: Clean Swipe is designed to help you manage and clean your photo library. You are responsible for any photos you choose to delete. Deleted photos are moved to your device's Recently Deleted folder.

subscriptions.title: 3. Subscriptions
subscriptions.text: Clean Swipe PRO offers auto-renewable subscriptions. Payment will be charged to your Apple ID account at confirmation of purchase. Subscriptions automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.

refunds.title: 4. Refunds
refunds.text: All purchases are processed through Apple. For refunds, please contact Apple Support directly through your purchase history.

intellectual.title: 5. Intellectual Property
intellectual.text: All content, features, and functionality of Clean Swipe are owned by us and protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

liability.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
liability.text: Clean Swipe is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We are not responsible for any data loss resulting from the use of this app. Always maintain backups of your important photos.

changes.title: 7. Changes to Terms
changes.text: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of the app after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

support.title: Support
support.subtitle: Clean Swipe
support.description: Need help? We're here for you.

items.question: How do I delete photos?
items.answer: Simply swipe left on a photo to mark it for deletion, or tap the trash button. Deleted photos are moved to your device's Recently Deleted folder.

items.question: How do I keep photos?
items.answer: Swipe right on a photo to keep it, or tap the checkmark button. The photo will remain in your library.

items.question: What is Clean Swipe PRO?
items.answer: Clean Swipe PRO unlocks unlimited swipes, video support, Smart Mode Gallery, and removes all ads.

items.question: How do I restore my purchase?
items.answer: Go to Settings in the app and tap 'Restore Purchases'. Make sure you're signed in with the same Apple ID used for the original purchase.

items.question: Are my photos uploaded anywhere?
items.answer: No. All photo processing happens locally on your device. We never upload, store, or share your photos.
